title: Savoury buckwheat pancakes
ingredients: ['For the pancakes', '250g buckwheat flour', '1 egg', 'salt', '425ml sparkling water', '100ml full fat milk', 'sunflower oil for frying', 'For the topping', '100g Parmesan, Gouda or Swiss Emmental cheese, grated', '4 tablespoons cream cheese, at room temperature', '2 to 3 tomatoes, sliced thinly', 'pepper', 'minced fresh parsley', 'a few chives to tie the pancakes together']
